home.p1: On 26 February the world learned about the murder of investigative journalist Ján Kuciak and his fiancée Martina Kušnírová.
home.days:
{daysSinceMurder} days

have passed since then.
home.p2: We are still waiting for an independent investigation and a government without ties to maffia.
home.h3: Every day we light a candle here for a decent Slovakia.

TheFooter.madeBy: Made with ❤ in 🇸🇰 by @phivk
